_header: Upon a night an angel bright
_description: James Ryman, a macaronic song of the Nativity — eight 6-line stanzas (ababcc) with ‘Nunc natus est altissimus’ refrain and burden: ‘Angelus inquit pastoribus / Nunc natus est altissimus’
